insights: Enhanced existing test suite with 21 new comprehensive boundary condition tests
Added validation tests for maximum length constraints (key: 256, name: 255, description: 1000 chars)
Included tests for special characters in API keys (dots, underscores, hyphens)
Added rate limit boundary testing (0 for unlimited, 10000 for maximum)
Implemented edge case tests for pagination (page beyond total, empty results, case-insensitive search)
All 68 ApiKey model tests now passing with complete coverage
Tests cover all CRUD operations, validation functions, helper functions, and error classes
Comprehensive test suite ensures data integrity, validation rules, and security features
Updated build progress documentation with test-2 completion details
Documented all 21 new test additions and their specific test scenarios
Recorded comprehensive test coverage including validation, CRUD operations, and error handling
Documented TypeScript compilation success and test pass counts (426 total tests)
Updated subtask test-2 status from 'pending' to 'completed'
Implementation plan reflects progress in testing phase
Phase tracking shows current transition from 'Error Handling & Response Formatting' to 'Testing'

patterns_discovered.description: Systematic testing of maximum length constraints and edge cases for all model validation rules
Testing all create, read, update, delete operations with both normal and edge case scenarios
Testing validation rules with both valid and invalid inputs to ensure robust error handling
Verifying security features like key hashing and sensitive data protection in responses
Testing pagination boundaries including page beyond total, empty results, and search functionality

gotchas_discovered.description: Testing edge cases at exact maximum length boundaries (255 chars for name, 256 for key, 1000 for description)
gotchas_discovered.impact: Required precise boundary testing to ensure validation works correctly at maximum limits

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Special character handling in API keys
gotchas_discovered.description: API keys allow dots, underscores, and hyphens but must be properly validated
gotchas_discovered.impact: Required specific test cases to verify allowed characters are accepted while maintaining security

gotchas_discovered.description: Rate limit values of 0 (unlimited) and 10000 (maximum) represent important boundary conditions
gotchas_discovered.impact: Required testing both boundary values to ensure proper validation and behavior

gotchas_discovered.description: Pagination must handle page numbers beyond total pages, empty results, and large page numbers
gotchas_discovered.impact: Required comprehensive testing to ensure graceful handling of all edge cases without errors

approach_outcome.approach_used: Enhanced existing test suite with comprehensive boundary condition testing, covering all model methods, validation functions, and edge cases
approach_outcome.why_it_worked: Leveraged existing test patterns and infrastructure, systematically added missing boundary condition tests, maintained backward compatibility, and followed established testing conventions

recommendations.recommendation: Add integration tests for API endpoints
recommendations.description: Create integration tests to verify the complete API workflow from request to response
Use property-based testing frameworks to generate random test cases for more thorough validation

recommendations.recommendation: Add performance testing for model operations
recommendations.description: Test model performance under load to ensure scalability and identify potential bottlenecks

recommendations.recommendation: Create test fixtures for common test scenarios
recommendations.description: Develop reusable test fixtures to reduce boilerplate code and improve test maintainability
Use mutation testing to verify test suite effectiveness by introducing bugs and ensuring tests catch them
Create factories for generating test data with consistent patterns and validation
